content:

inventory=[{"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 10}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 12}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "andesite_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 58, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 58, "index": 21}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 20, "index": 22}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 11, "index": 24}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 28, "index": 26}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "splash_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 42}, {"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 43}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a campfire, I need to place a stick in the middle of the crafting grid. Therefore I will move one of the sticks from slot 41 into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1
